definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: You can expect high quality concentrated pheromone products from Magic Scent.
sentences.chinese: 很多费洛蒙本身是有味道的，气味因费洛蒙种类而异。

sentences.english: For real pheromone, it is impossible to be obtained at so cheap price.
sentences.chinese: 真正高品质的费洛蒙，是不可能那么便宜可以购得的。

sentences.english: Branding on the Internet and includes perfume "pheromone" cologne.
sentences.chinese: 网上交易专用费洛蒙香水知名品牌包括科隆香水。

sentences.english: She has personally been involved in the creation of chemically exact duplications of Human Pheromones.
sentences.chinese: 她亲自参与了复制出真正人类费洛蒙的科学发现过程。
我们怎么闻到费洛蒙的？

sentences.english: Sarah and Dave were wearing the pheromones.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉与大卫使用了费洛蒙。

sentences.english: Pheromones are body scents that we cannot smell.
sentences.chinese: 费洛蒙是我们闻不出来的身体气味。

definition: to promote estrus/to bring an animal to heat by artificial means
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
opposite polarities attract/(fig.) opposite sexes attract/opposites attract
